sentences.en: Analogous coefficients are usually defined for the lift.
sentences.cn: 对于浮托力一般也能定义类似的系数.

sentences.en: He received a reply no doubt produced by analogous procedures.
sentences.cn: 他所得到的回答无疑也是这一类文稿.

sentences.en: In physics, conservation laws are analogous to linguistic rules.
sentences.cn: 物理学的守恒定律类似于语言学规则.

sentences.en: Marine construction technology like this is very complex, somewhat analogous to trying to build a bridge under water.
sentences.cn: 像这样的海底建造技术很复杂，与尝试在水下建桥有些相似。

sentences.en: Such classes are separated by'natural breaks'in the frequency distribution or the analogous cumulative curve.
sentences.cn: 这样的级可由频率分布或类似的累积曲线中的自然断点划分开来.

sentences.en: The analogous column is derived from frame without the overhangs.
sentences.cn: 比拟柱按无挑臂框架导出.

sentences.en: The company is in a position closely analogous to that of its main rival.
sentences.cn: 该公司与主要竞爭对手的处境极为相似.

sentences.en: The gills of fishes are analogous to the lungs in terrestrial animals.
sentences.cn: 鱼类的鳃与陆上动物的肺类似.

sentences.en: The two situations are roughly analogous.
These amine substituted acid may polymenze in an analogous manner to unsubst ituted oxo - anions.
sentences.cn: 这些氨取代酸可以与未取代的氧络阴离子相类似方式聚合.

sentences.en: This condensate is analogous to the familiar Bose - Einstein condensate.
sentences.cn: 这种凝聚态类似于我们所熟悉的玻色 - 爱因斯坦凝聚态.

sentences.en: This is analogous to the successive approximation given by the terms of a Taylor expansion.
sentences.cn: 这类似通过泰勒法展开各项所给出的逐次逼近法.

sentences.en: This process is analogous to a car coasting up a hill.
sentences.cn: 这个过程类似于汽车靠惯性爬山.

sentences.en: This reaction, called the Hofman elimination, is quite analogous to the dehydrohalogenation of an alkyl halide.
sentences.cn: 这个反应称为Hofman消除反应, 它很像卤代烷的脱卤化氢反应.

sentences.en: Yet analogous remarks holds for the realm of physics.
sentences.cn: 然而,类似的说法在自然科学领域中也是成立的.

words.tran_cn: 类似的；相似物的；模拟计算机的
类似物；类似情况；对等的人
对…作类比；以类推来说明（等于analogize）

trans.tran_en: similar to another situation or thing so that a comparison can be made
